help.title: Help
help.verifyAnswer: To verify your account, you need to provide ID card and take a selfie.
help.forgotPassword: What to do if forgot password?
help.forgotPasswordAnswer: You can use the Forgot Password feature and follow the instructions.
help.feesAnswer: Transaction fees are calculated based on transaction type and amount.
help.processingAnswer: Normal processing time is 5-10 minutes depending on transaction type.

detailHistory.title: Transaction Detail
detailHistory.validFor15Minutes: This transaction is valid for 15 minutes. Time left: {{time}}

detailHistory.qrCodeInvalid: This QR code is no longer valid. Please create a new transaction.
detailHistory.pendingNote: Please transfer the exact amount to the bank account above. Your USDT will be sent to your wallet after payment confirmation.
detailHistory.completedNote: This transaction has been completed. No further action required.
detailHistory.verifiedBankAccountsOnly: We only accept transfers from verified bank accounts:
detailHistory.noVerifiedBankAccounts: You don't have any verified bank accounts yet. Please add an account in Settings.
detailHistory.sellPendingNote: Please send USDT to the wallet address above. Your VND will be transferred to your bank account after confirmation.
